mapper.select: SELECT A.CUST_NAME_CHINESE, A.CUST_NAME_ENGLISH, A.CUST_ID, A.SERVICELEVEL, A.CUST_ADDRESS, A.CUST_EMAIL, A.CUST_TEL, A.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_NAME, A.CUST_INDUSTRY, A.UPPERCODE, A.UPPERNAME, A.CST_ORD_ID FROM GOM_BDW_CST_ORD A WHERE A.CST_ORD_ID = #{cstOrdId}

SELECT distinct /* A.SERVICE_ID, A.INSTANCE_ID, replace( b.CODE_CONTENT,' ','') AS prodName, A.QCWOORDERCODE, A.OMORDERCODE, A.MAINORG, A.MAINORG_BDW,*/ A.ACTIVE_TYPE, A.CST_ORD_ID, A.SRV_ORD_ID, A.ORDER_ID, GD.DISPATCH_ORDER_ID FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO A LEFT JOIN GOM_BDW_CODE_INFO B ON A.SERVICE_ID = B.CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN GOM_BDW_DISPATCH_ORDER GD ON GD.CST_ORD_ID=A.CST_ORD_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CST_ORD_ID = #{cstOrdId} AND GD.DISPATCH_SOURCE = 'onedry'

SELECT distinct A.TRADE_TYPE_CODE, /* A.SERVICE_ID, replace( b.CODE_CONTENT,' ','') AS prodName, A.QCWOORDERCODE, A.OMORDERCODE, A.MAINORG, A.MAINORG_BDW,*/ A.ACTIVE_TYPE, A.CST_ORD_ID, A.SRV_ORD_ID, A.ORDER_ID, A.DISPATCH_ORDER_ID, A.ORDER_TYPE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO A JOIN GOM_BDW_CST_ORD CO ON CO.CST_ORD_ID=A.CST_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN GOM_BDW_CODE_INFO B ON A.SERVICE_ID = B.CODE_VALUE WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CRM_PROD_INST_ID = #{crmProdInstId} AND A.TRADE_TYPE_CODE = #{tradeTypeCode} AND A.ACTIVE_TYPE = #{actType} AND CO.ONEDRY_AREA_CODE = #{onedryAreaCode} AND A.SRV_ORD_STAT not in ('10X', '10F') ORDER BY A.SRV_ORD_ID desc
SELECT A.ATTR_NAME, A.ATTR_VALUE_NAME, A.ATTR_VALUE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO A WHERE A.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId}

SELECT A.DISPATCH_ORDER_NO, A.STAFF_NAME, A.STAFF_TEL, A.STAFF_ORG, A.ISSUER, A.SEND_DATE, A.DISPATCH_TYPE, A.DISPATCH_GRADE, A.DISPATCH_URGENCY, A.DISPATCH_TITLE, A.DISPATCH_SEND_ORG, A.DISPATCH_COPY_ORG, A.DISPATCH_TEXT, A.CHANGE_BEFORE_TEXT, A.CHANGE_AFTER_TEXT FROM GOM_BDW_DISPATCH_ORDER A WHERE A.STATE = '10A' AND A.DISPATCH_ORDER_ID = #{dispatchOrderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_CHANGE_ORDER_LOG_S( ID, SRC_CST_ORDER_ID, SRC_ORDER_ID, CHG_ORDER_ID, CHG_TYPE, FILED_TYPE, CHANGE_DATA, CHANGE_MESSAGE, CHG_VERSION )VALUES( SEQ_GOM_CHANGE_ORDER_LOG_S.NEXTVAL, #{SRC_CST_ORDER_ID}, #{SRC_ORDER_ID}, #{CHG_ORDER_ID}, #{CHG_TYPE}, #{FILED_TYPE}, #{CHANGE_DATA}, #{CHANGE_MESSAGE}, #{CHG_VERSION} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO_HIS A WHERE A.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND A.ATTR_VALUE_NAME = #{attrValueName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO_HIS( ATTR_INFO_ID, SRV_ORD_ID, SRV_ORD_ID_RELA, ATTR_INFO_ID_RELA, ATTR_ACTION, ATTR_CODE, ATTR_NAME, ATTR_VALUE, ATTR_VALUE_NAME, CREATE_DATE, SOURSE, STATE ) SELECT A.ATTR_INFO_ID, A.SRV_ORD_ID, 0, 0, A.ATTR_ACTION, A.ATTR_CODE, A.ATTR_NAME, A.ATTR_VALUE, A.ATTR_VALUE_NAME, sysdate, A.SOURSE, '10F' FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO A WHERE A.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND A.ATTR_VALUE_NAME = #{attrValueName}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM GOM_BDW_CST_ORD_HIS WHERE CST_ORD_ID = #{cstOrdId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_CST_ORD_HIS( CUST_NAME_CHINESE, CUST_NAME_ENGLISH, CUST_ID, SERVICELEVEL, CUST_ADDRESS, CUST_EMAIL, CUST_TEL, CUST_CONTACT_MAN_NAME, CUST_INDUSTRY, UPPERCODE, UPPERNAME, CST_ORD_ID, CREATE_DATE, CST_ORD_ID_RELA ) SELECT A.CUST_NAME_CHINESE, A.CUST_NAME_ENGLISH, A.CUST_ID, A.SERVICELEVEL, A.CUST_ADDRESS, A.CUST_EMAIL, A.CUST_TEL, A.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_NAME, A.CUST_INDUSTRY, A.UPPERCODE, A.UPPERNAME, A.CST_ORD_ID, sysdate, 0 FROM GOM_BDW_CST_ORD A WHERE A.CST_ORD_ID = #{cstOrdId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM GOM_BDW_DISPATCH_ORDER_HIS WHERE DISPATCH_ORDER_ID = #{dispatchOrderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_DISPATCH_ORDER_HIS( DISPATCH_ORDER_ID, DISPATCH_ORDER_NO, CREATE_DATE, DISPATCH_TITLE, DISPATCH_TEXT ) SELECT A.DISPATCH_ORDER_ID, A.DISPATCH_ORDER_NO, sysdate, A.DISPATCH_TITLE, A.DISPATCH_TEXT FROM GOM_BDW_DISPATCH_ORDER A WHERE A.DISPATCH_ORDER_ID = #{dispatchOrderId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO_HIS WHERE SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO_HIS( SRV_ORD_ID, CST_ORD_ID, ORDER_ID, CST_ORD_ID_RELA, SRV_ORD_ID_RELA, SERVICE_ID, QCWOORDERCODE, OMORDERCODE, MAINORG, MAINORG_BDW, ACTIVE_TYPE ) SELECT A.SRV_ORD_ID, A.CST_ORD_ID, A.ORDER_ID, 0, 0, A.SERVICE_ID, A.QCWOORDERCODE, A.OMORDERCODE, A.MAINORG, A.MAINORG_BDW, A.ACTIVE_TYPE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO A WHERE A.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.AREA_ID, B.OBJ_TYPE, B.ACT_TYPE FROM GOM_ORDER A LEFT JOIN GOM_PS_2_ORD_S B ON A.PS_ID=B.ID WHERE A.ORDER_ID=#{orderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE GOM_ORDER A SET A.REQ_FIN_DATE = TO_DATE(#{reqFinDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') WHERE A.ORDER_ID = (SELECT ORDER_ID FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO WHERE SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId})
mapper.select: SELECT A.ATTR_NAME, A.ATTR_VALUE_NAME, A.ATTR_VALUE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO A WHERE A.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND A.ATTR_VALUE_NAME = #{attrValueName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO ( ATTR_INFO_ID, SRV_ORD_ID, ATTR_ACTION, ATTR_NAME, ATTR_VALUE, ATTR_VALUE_NAME, CREATE_DATE, SOURSE ) VALUES ( SEQ_GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO.NEXTVAL, #{srvOrdId}, '0', #{attrName}, #{attrValue}, #{attrValueName}, sysdate, 'onedry' )

INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO ( ATTR_INFO_ID, SRV_ORD_ID, ATTR_ACTION, ATTR_NAME, ATTR_VALUE, ATTR_VALUE_NAME, CREATE_DATE ) select SEQ_GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO.NEXTVAL , #{srvOrdId}, '0', (select max(attr_name) || '' from gom_BDW_srv_ord_attr_info where attr_value_name = #{attrValueName}) as attr_name, #{attrValue}, #{attrValueName}, sysdate from dual
mapper.select: SELECT A.SERVICE_ID, replace( B.CODE_CONTENT,' ','') AS serviceName, A.TRADE_TYPE_CODE, A.ACTIVE_TYPE, A.SERVICE_OFFER_ID, A.SERIAL_NUMBER, A.TRADE_ID, A.TRADE_ID_RELA, A.USER_ID, A.FLOW_ID, A.CST_ORD_ID, A.SRV_ORD_ID, A.ORDER_ID FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO A JOIN GOM_BDW_CODE_INFO B ON A.SERVICE_ID = B.CODE_VALUE and code_type='product_code' WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CST_ORD_ID = #{cstOrdId}
SELECT A.ATTR_ACTION, A.ATTR_CODE, A.ATTR_NAME, A.ATTR_VALUE, A.ATTR_VALUE_NAME FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO A WHERE A.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId}

SELECT A.PROJECT_TYPE, A.NETWORK_LEVEL, A.DEAL_AREA_CODE, A.GROUP_PM_ID, A.GROUP_PM_NAME, A.GROUP_PM_TEL, A.GROUP_PM_EMAIL, A.PROVINCE_PM_ID, A.PROVINCE_PM_NAME, A.PROVINCE_PM_TEL, A.PROVINCE_PM_EMAIL, A.INIT_AM_ID, A.INIT_AM_NAME, A.INIT_AM_TEL, A.INIT_AM_EMAIL, A.HANDLE_TIME, A.HANDLE_CITY_ID, A.HANDLE_DEP, A.HANDLE_MAN_NAME, A.HANDLE_MAN_TEL, A.REMARK, A.CUST_ID, A.CONTRACT_ID, A.CONTRACT_NAME, A.CUST_NAME_CHINESE, A.CUST_NAME_ENGLISH, A.CUST_ADDRESS, A.CUST_INDUSTRY, A.CUST_TYPE, A.CUST_PROVINCE, A.CUST_CITY, A.CUST_TEL, A.CUST_FAX, A.CUST_EMAIL, A.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_ID, A.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_NAME, A.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_TEL, A.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_EMAIL, A.CUST_OPERATOR_NAME, A.CUST_OPERATOR_TEL, A.CUST_OPERATOR_EMAIL FROM GOM_BDW_CST_ORD A WHERE A.CST_ORD_ID = #{cstOrdId}
SELECT PROPERTY_NAME FROM gom_bdw_property_info WHERE PROPERTY_ID = #{propertyId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_CST_ORD_HIS( PROJECT_TYPE, NETWORK_LEVEL, DEAL_AREA_CODE, GROUP_PM_ID, GROUP_PM_NAME, GROUP_PM_TEL, GROUP_PM_EMAIL, PROVINCE_PM_ID, PROVINCE_PM_NAME, PROVINCE_PM_TEL, PROVINCE_PM_EMAIL, INIT_AM_ID, INIT_AM_NAME, INIT_AM_TEL, INIT_AM_EMAIL, HANDLE_TIME, HANDLE_CITY, HANDLE_DEP, HANDLE_MAN_NAME, HANDLE_MAN_TEL, REMARK, CUST_ID, CONTRACT_ID, CONTRACT_NAME, CUST_NAME_CHINESE, CUST_NAME_ENGLISH, CUST_ADDRESS, CUST_INDUSTRY, CUST_TYPE, CUST_PROVINCE, CUST_CITY, CUST_TEL, CUST_FAX, CUST_EMAIL, CUST_CONTACT_MAN_ID, CUST_CONTACT_MAN_NAME, CUST_CONTACT_MAN_TEL, CUST_CONTACT_MAN_EMAIL, CUST_OPERATOR_NAME, CUST_OPERATOR_TEL, CUST_OPERATOR_EMAIL, CST_ORD_ID, CREATE_DATE, CST_ORD_ID_RELA ) SELECT A.PROJECT_TYPE, A.NETWORK_LEVEL, A.DEAL_AREA_CODE, A.GROUP_PM_ID, A.GROUP_PM_NAME, A.GROUP_PM_TEL, A.GROUP_PM_EMAIL, A.PROVINCE_PM_ID, A.PROVINCE_PM_NAME, A.PROVINCE_PM_TEL, A.PROVINCE_PM_EMAIL, A.INIT_AM_ID, A.INIT_AM_NAME, A.INIT_AM_TEL, A.INIT_AM_EMAIL, A.HANDLE_TIME, A.HANDLE_CITY, A.HANDLE_DEP, A.HANDLE_MAN_NAME, A.HANDLE_MAN_TEL, A.REMARK, A.CUST_ID, A.CONTRACT_ID, A.CONTRACT_NAME, A.CUST_NAME_CHINESE, A.CUST_NAME_ENGLISH, A.CUST_ADDRESS, A.CUST_INDUSTRY, A.CUST_TYPE, A.CUST_PROVINCE, A.CUST_CITY, A.CUST_TEL, A.CUST_FAX, A.CUST_EMAIL, A.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_ID, A.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_NAME, A.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_TEL, A.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_EMAIL, A.CUST_OPERATOR_NAME, A.CUST_OPERATOR_TEL, A.CUST_OPERATOR_EMAIL, A.CST_ORD_ID, sysdate, 0 FROM GOM_BDW_CST_ORD A WHERE A.CST_ORD_ID = #{cstOrdId}

INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO_HIS( SERVICE_ID, TRADE_TYPE_CODE, ACTIVE_TYPE, SERVICE_OFFER_ID, SERIAL_NUMBER, TRADE_ID, TRADE_ID_RELA, USER_ID, FLOW_ID, CST_ORD_ID, SRV_ORD_ID, ORDER_ID, CST_ORD_ID_RELA, SRV_ORD_ID_RELA ) SELECT A.SERVICE_ID, A.TRADE_TYPE_CODE, A.ACTIVE_TYPE, A.SERVICE_OFFER_ID, A.SERIAL_NUMBER, A.TRADE_ID, A.TRADE_ID_RELA, A.USER_ID, A.FLOW_ID, A.CST_ORD_ID, A.SRV_ORD_ID, A.ORDER_ID, 0, 0 FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO A WHERE A.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO_HIS A WHERE A.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND A.ATTR_CODE = #{attrCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO_HIS( ATTR_INFO_ID, SRV_ORD_ID, SRV_ORD_ID_RELA, ATTR_INFO_ID_RELA, ATTR_ACTION, ATTR_CODE, ATTR_NAME, ATTR_VALUE, ATTR_VALUE_NAME, CREATE_DATE, SOURSE, STATE ) SELECT A.ATTR_INFO_ID, A.SRV_ORD_ID, 0, 0, A.ATTR_ACTION, A.ATTR_CODE, A.ATTR_NAME, A.ATTR_VALUE, A.ATTR_VALUE_NAME, sysdate, A.SOURSE, '10F' FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO A WHERE A.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND A.ATTR_CODE = #{attrCode}
mapper.select: select distinct property_id ,property_name from gom_bdw_property_info where selectstat=1 and PROPERTY_ID = #{propertyId}
select code_content from gom_bdw_code_info where code_type = #{codeType} and code_value= #{codeValue}
SELECT A.ATTR_ACTION, A.ATTR_CODE, A.ATTR_NAME, A.ATTR_VALUE, A.ATTR_VALUE_NAME FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO A WHERE A.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND A.ATTR_CODE = #{attrCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO ( ATTR_INFO_ID, SRV_ORD_ID, ATTR_ACTION, ATTR_CODE, ATTR_VALUE, CREATE_DATE, SOURSE ) VALUES ( SEQ_GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO.NEXTVAL, #{srvOrdId}, '0', #{attrCode}, #{attrValue}, sysdate, 'jike' )
